__TOC__

=== Install the Server ===
<pre>
sudo apt-get install tftpd-hpa
</pre>

The default boot TFTP directory is <code>/var/lib/tftpboot</code>.

=== Download an Ubuntu Server ISO ===

<pre>
wget http://releases.ubuntu.com/10.04/ubuntu-10.04-server-amd64.iso
</pre>

=== Mount the ISO, and copy the netboot directory ===

<pre>
sudo mount -o loop ubuntu-10.04-server-amd64.iso /mnt
sudo rsync -a --delete /mnt/install/netboot/ /var/lib/tftpboot/
sudo umount /mnt
</pre>
